summary: Implements a Safe Stable Diffusion pipeline that converts textual prompts into images using latent diffusion, integrates an autoencoder, UNet denoiser, CLIP text and vision models, and applies a safety checker to filter unsafe or offensive outputs.
business_intent: Enable developers and platforms to generate AIâ€‘created images from user prompts while automatically enforcing content safety policies, reducing the risk of producing harmful or inappropriate visual material.
